name: King Of Gods
description:
A little girl Bridgett struggles with understanding her differences while trying to appear normal to her friends, everything gets worst when she turns 12 and is introduced to a stranger, the stranger seems to know all about her but only tells her bits and pieces. She is told that she must collect 25 precious stones along with some other items which belongs to her, every time she collects one of these precious stones, memories of her past will be regained, and that these memories will provide answers to questions that pinnacle her greatest of desires…  The precious stones may answer many of her questions… but, …… what horrid memories will it bring to the light!....

King Of Gods Website...
